programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: A man who has been trapped inside a mysterious jungle board game for 26 years is eventually freed when two children start to play it. Unfortunately, he arrives with a rampaging horde of animals on his heels, leaving only one solution - to finish the game he started all those years ago. Fantasy adventure, starring Robin Williams, Kirsten Dunst and Bonnie Hunt.(n)

programme.title: Wild Things
programme.desc: A high-school counsellor is accused of rape by a student whose advances he spurned - and unfortunately for him, one of her peers backs up her story. Thriller, starring Neve Campbell, Denise Richards, Matt Dillon, Kevin Bacon, Theresa Russell, Robert Wagner and Bill Murray.

programme.title: Hijacked
programme.desc: FBI agent Gretchen Blair finds herself caught in the middle of an elaborate mid-air heist. Thriller, starring Denise Richards, Dolph Lundgren and Chuck Liddell.

programme.title: Deep Family Secrets
programme.desc: A girl sets out on a personal quest to discover the truth about her mother's alleged abduction, and uncovers a tangled tale of adultery, incest and murder. Thriller, starring Richard Crenna, Angie Dickinson and Meg Foster.

programme.title: Extortion
programme.desc: When a Caribbean family vacation takes a disastrous turn, a father finds himself at the mercy of a ruthless fisherman, and races against the clock to save his wife and son. Drama, starring Eion Bailey, Bethany Joy Lenz and Barkhad Abdi.

programme.title: Freehold
programme.desc: Fast-talking estate agent Hussein finds his personal and professional life unravelling as a wronged former client takes his revenge. Comedy horror, starring Javier Botet, Mandeep Dhillon and Mim Shaikh.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: In the Line of Fire
programme.desc: An ageing secret service agent, tormented by his failure to save the life of John F Kennedy in 1963, is drawn into a battle of wits with a sinister CIA-trained assassin out to kill the current president. As the day of reckoning draws closer, the agent's nerves are tested to the limit - and nothing seems to be going his way. Wolfgang Petersen's thriller, starring Clint Eastwood, John Malkovich, Rene Russo and Dylan McDermott.

programme.title: Armored
programme.desc: A down-on-his-luck new recruit at an armoured truck company agrees to join his colleagues in a heist on one of their own vehicles, on the condition that no one gets hurt. However, when the plan starts to unravel and a witness is murdered, the thieves begin to turn on one another. Crime thriller, starring Matt Dillon, Columbus Short, Jean Reno and Laurence Fishburne.

programme.title: The Bourne Ultimatum
programme.desc: Amnesiac rogue assassin Jason Bourne's long-buried memories are reawakened by a British journalist researching the secret organisation that was responsible for transforming him into a killing machine. Meanwhile, a ruthless CIA director becomes convinced Bourne is still a security risk, and plans to dispose of him once and for all. Third instalment of the spy thriller series, directed by Paul Greengrass and starring Matt Damon, Joan Allen, Julia Stiles, David Strathairn, Paddy Considine, Scott Glenn and Albert Finney.

programme.title: Angels & Demons
programme.desc: Academic adventurer Robert Langdon is called in by the Vatican to deal with a crisis. The Pope has died and the four cardinals in line to be his successor have all been abducted by a mysterious sect that is threatening to murder them. As he searches for the kidnapped clerics, Langdon discovers the cult has an even more horrific plan in mind. Thriller sequel to The Da Vinci Code, with Tom Hanks and Ewan McGregor.

programme.title: Road House
programme.desc: A philosophy-reading kung fu expert gains a reputation as the best bouncer around, and is hired by the owner of a rowdy Missouri bar to keep the peace. When he fires some of the establishment's corrupt staff, he incurs the wrath of a local crime boss who has a stranglehold on the town's businesses. Action thriller, starring Patrick Swayze, Ben Gazzara, Kelly Lynch, Sam Elliott and blues singer Jeff Healey.

programme.title: Shot Caller
programme.desc: An ex con is forced by the leaders of his gang to orchestrate a major crime with a brutal rival squad on the streets of Southern California. Crime drama, starring Jon Bernthal, Nikolaj Coster-Waldau and Lake Bell.

programme.title: Eliminators
programme.desc: A former federal agent in the witness protection programme is forced to come out of hiding and go on the run. Thriller, starring Scott Adkins, Stu Bennett and Daniel Caltagirone.

programme.title: Angel Flight Down
programme.desc: A mercy mission runs into difficulty when the plane commissioned to airlift a sick girl suffers engine trouble and crashes on the edge of a cliff. Drama, starring Patricia Kalember and David Charvet.

programme.title: Rememory
programme.desc: When the creator of a device able to record and play a person's memories is found dead, his reclusive wife delves deeper into her own private world to crack the mystery. Hi-tech murdery mystery, starring Peter Dinklage, Matt Ellis and Jordana Largy.

programme.title: Flightplan
programme.desc: A widow boards a plane with her daughter and promptly falls asleep. When she wakes up, the girl has disappeared - and the mother's fear turns to outright panic when the aircraft crew insists she boarded the flight alone, suggesting the child is merely a figment of her distressed imagination. Thriller, starring Jodie Foster, Peter Sarsgaard, Sean Bean and Greta Scacchi.

programme.title: Along Came a Spider
programme.desc: A police forensic psychologist searches for the daughter of a senator, who has been kidnapped from her expensive private school by a media-obsessed teacher, sparking a desperate race to hunt down her psychotic and devilishly intelligent captor before it is too late. Thriller prequel to Kiss the Girls, starring Morgan Freeman, Monica Potter, Michael Wincott, Dylan Baker and Penelope Ann Miller.

programme.title: Hoffa
programme.desc: Biopic of the American union leader, who was a key figure in a labour organisation of truck drivers for three decades, a role that brought him into conflict with both the federal government and into dangerous alliances with organised crime - which may have led to his mysterious disappearance. Starring Jack Nicholson, Armand Assante, John C Reilly and Danny DeVito, who also directed.

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.

programme.title: The Mexican
programme.desc: A petty crook finds himself in a tricky situation when he tries to smuggle an antique gun from Mexico into America for his Mob boss. As events begin to spiral out of control, his girlfriend's displeasure and a pursuing hitman only add to the would-be bootlegger's woes. Comedy thriller directed by Gore Verbinski, with Brad Pitt, Julia Roberts, James Gandolfini, Gene Hackman and JK Simmons.

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.

programme.title: Fast & Furious 8
programme.desc: When a mysterious woman seduces Dominic Toretto into the world of terrorism, the crew faces the biggest trials of their lives. Action sequel, starring Vin Diesel, Charlize Theron and Dwayne Johnson.

programme.title: The French Connection
programme.desc: Two tough New York cops use unorthodox methods to try to break an international drug ring. When their information leads them to place a candy store under surveillance, they discover the owners are the American agents for a French kingpin planning to ship millions of dollars worth of heroin into the US. Oscar-winning fact-based thriller, starring Gene Hackman, Roy Scheider, Fernando Rey and Tony Lo Bianco.

programme.title: Blood Father
programme.desc: An ex-con battles to protect his estranged daughter from the cronies of her cartel member ex. Action thriller, starring Mel Gibson, Erin Moriarty and Diego Luna.(n)

programme.title: Split
programme.desc: After being abducted by a kidnapper with multiple personalities, three young women are soon engaged in a fight for survival. Meanwhile, an oblivious psychiatrist tries to ease her patient's fractured mind as a 24th character attempts to dominate his body. M Night Shyamalan's thriller, starring James McAvoy, Anya Taylor-Joy and Betty Buckley.(n)

programme.title: To Catch a Thief
programme.desc: A retired cat burglar becomes the prime suspect for a series of robberies carried out in his own distinctive style, and sets out to clear his name by catching the copycat crook responsible. His quest takes him to the Cote d'Azur, where he encounters the demure daughter of a wealthy holiday-maker, and before long the two are drawn together. Alfred Hitchcock's Oscar-winning romantic mystery, starring Cary Grant, Grace Kelly and Jessie Royce Landis.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: The Bourne Legacy
programme.desc: The leaders of a secret government agency plan to eliminate several agents as part of a cover-up when they face having their dark secrets exposed. One of the targets is able to evade his fate and go on the run - but his escape is threatened by his dependence on drugs to boost his physical and mental capabilities. Spy thriller sequel, with Jeremy Renner, Rachel Weisz and Edward Norton.(n)

programme.title: Four Brothers
programme.desc: When their adoptive mother is killed in a robbery, her four sons reunite and swear vengeance on the murderers. But the background to her apparently random death turns out to be more complex than it first appeared, as the trail leads to corrupt cops and a notorious local gang boss. Thriller, starring Mark Wahlberg, Tyrese Gibson, Andre Benjamin, Garrett Hedlund, Chiwetel Ejiofor and Terrence Howard.(n)

programme.title: Unforgettable
programme.desc: A woman sets out to make life a living hell for her ex-husband's new fiancee. Thriller, starring Rosario Dawson, Katherine Heigl and Geoff Stults.(n)

programme.title: The Godfather
programme.desc: The patriarch of the Corleone crime family is hospitalised after an attempt on his life and entrusts control of his business to his three sons - the violent and unpredictable Sonny, the weak-willed Fredo, and Michael, the youngest brother, who reluctantly takes up the reins but proves to be the most ruthless of them all. Francis Ford Coppola's gangster drama, starring Marlon Brando, Al Pacino, James Caan, John Cazale, Talia Shire, Robert Duvall and Diane Keaton.(n)

programme.title: Murder On The Orient Express
programme.desc: When a murder occurs on the train he is travelling on, celebrated detective Hercule Poirot is recruited to solve the case. Mystery, directed by and starring Kenneth Branagh, with Daisy Ridley, Derek Jacobi and Johnny Depp.(n)

programme.title: The Untouchables
programme.desc: Incorruptible federal agent Eliot Ness is assigned the task of fighting organised crime in Prohibition-era Chicago and bringing the notorious crime boss Al Capone to justice. Aware crooked police are undermining his investigations, he puts together his own elite squad to take on the Mob. Brian De Palma's crime thriller, with Kevin Costner, Robert De Niro, Andy Garcia and Sean Connery, who won an Oscar for his performance.(n)

programme.title: Rambo
programme.desc: The bandana-wearing one-man army has turned his back on violence to live a quiet life in Thailand. But before long he takes up arms once again to rescue a party of missionaries who have been taken captive en route to Burma by a sadistic military officer. Action sequel, directed by and starring Sylvester Stallone. With Julie Benz and Graham McTavish.

programme.title: Manhattan Night
programme.desc: Porter Wren, a columnist and crime reporter for a New York City newspaper, is convinced by the alluring Caroline Crowley to investigate her film director husband's death. Thriller, starring Adrien Brody, Yvonne Strahovski and Jennifer Beals.

programme.title: The Transfiguration
programme.desc: Vampire-obsessed New York orphan Milo finds his disturbing fantasies blurring with reality after forming a bond with another troubled teen. Horror, starring Eric Ruffin, Chloe Levine and Dangelo Bonneli.

programme.title: The Shanghai Job
programme.desc: A washed-up private security agent has to escort a valuable Chinese antique out of Shanghai, but is ambushed during the journey. Action thriller, starring Orlando Bloom, Lei Wu and Simon Yam.

programme.title: Inconceivable
programme.desc: A mother looks to escape her abusive past by moving to a new town. There she befriends another mother, who grows suspicious of her. Thriller, starring Gina Gershon, Faye Dunaway and Nicolas Cage.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: A crew of colonists sent to populate an alien planet have their mission diverted by a mysterious signal. After landing on a nearby world, they discover what became of the ill-fated Prometheus mission. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, starring Katherine Waterston, Michael Fassbender and Danny McBride.

programme.title: Drone
programme.desc: A drone pilot who's spent his career conducting covert operations from the comfort of his own home is finally forced to confront his actions. Thriller, starring Sean Bean, Patrick Sabongui and Mary McCormack.

programme.title: Lowriders
programme.desc: A young LA street artist's life is complicated by his car-loving dad and ex-con brother. Drama, starring Gabriel Chavarria, Demian Bichir and Theo Rossi.

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: After being coerced into working for a crime boss, a young getaway driver with tinnitus takes part in a heist doomed to fail. Edgar Wright's music-themed action thriller, starring Ansel Elgort, Kevin Spacey and Jon Hamm.

programme.title: Alien: Covenant
programme.desc: A crew of colonists sent to populate an alien planet have their mission diverted by a mysterious signal. After landing on a nearby world, they discover what became of the ill-fated Prometheus mission. Ridley Scott's sci-fi thriller, starring Katherine Waterston, Michael Fassbender and Danny McBride.

programme.title: Rough Night
programme.desc: Things go terribly wrong for a group of girlfriends who hire a male stripper for a hen party in Miami. Comedy, starring Scarlett Johansson, Kate McKinnon and Zoe Kravitz.

programme.title: Jungle
programme.desc: A group of friends join a guide for a trek into the Bolivian jungle, searching for an Indian village, and soon realise how dangerous the region is. Fact-based adventure, starring Daniel Radcliffe, Thomas Kretschmann and Alex Russell.

programme.title: First Kill
programme.desc: A desperate father is blackmailed into helping a criminal gang evade a corrupt police chief. Action thriller, starring Bruce Willis, Hayden Christensen and Ty Shelton.

programme.title: Mune: Guardian Of The Moon
programme.desc: Young forest faun Mune embarks on an epic quest to reclaim the sun from the villainous ruler of the underworld. Fantasy animation, featuring the voices of Omar Sy, Izia Higelin and Michael Gregorio.

programme.title: The Girl with All the Gifts
programme.desc: A scientist and a teacher living in a dystopian future embark on a journey of survival with a young girl named Melanie. Horror thriller, starring Gemma Arterton, Paddy Considine, Glenn Close and Sennia Nanua.

programme.title: My All-American
programme.desc: Freddie Steinmark is an underdog American footballer who battles personal problems to become a University of Texas legend. Sporting biopic, starring Aaron Eckhart, Finn Wittrock and Robin Tunney.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Secret agents Eggsy and Merlin join forces with their US counterparts to bring down a psychotic femme fatale. Thankfully they are assisted by a veteran hero brought back from the dead. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Anon
programme.desc: In a world without anonymity or crime, a detective meets a woman who threatens their security. Sci-fi thriller from Gattaca and In Time director Andrew Niccol, starring Clive Owen, Amanda Seyfried and Colm Feore.

programme.title: Think Like a Man Too
programme.desc: A couple announce they are getting married in Las Vegas, so all their friends descend on the gambling capital. However, the build-up to the big day descends into a bitter rivalry between the male and female guests over who can throw the wildest pre-marital party - despite the efforts of the groom's overbearing mother to disrupt the celebrations. Comedy sequel, starring Kevin Hart and Regina Hall.

programme.title: The Accountant
programme.desc: High-functioning autistic number-cruncher Christian Wolff moonlights as a money launderer for the mob. However, the Treasury Department starts closing in on him as the body count rises. Thriller, starring Ben Affleck, Anna Kendrick and JK Simmons.

programme.title: Kingsman: The Golden Circle
programme.desc: Secret agents Eggsy and Merlin join forces with their US counterparts to bring down a psychotic femme fatale. Thankfully they are assisted by a veteran hero brought back from the dead. Comedy adventure sequel, starring Taron Egerton, Colin Firth, Mark Strong and Julianne Moore.

programme.title: Life
programme.desc: A team of scientists on the International Space Station fight for survival when an intelligent alien life form is brought on board. The creature, nicknamed Calvin, proves it will do anthing to stay alive, and the crew risk everything to ensure it does not make its way to Earth. Sci-fi thriller, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rebecca Ferguson, Ryan Reynolds and Ariyon Bakare.

programme.title: The Jurassic Games
programme.desc: In the near future, 10 death row convicts are forced to compete in a virtual reality game that pits them against dinosaurs and each other. Sci-fi thriller, starring Ryan Merriman, Perrey Reeves and Adam Hampton.(n)

programme.title: Sky
programme.desc: A French woman embarks on a life-changing trip through the California desert after a dramatic blow-up with her husband. Drama, starring Diane Kruger and Norman Reedus.(n)

programme.title: My All-American
programme.desc: Freddie Steinmark is an underdog American footballer who battles personal problems to become a University of Texas legend. Sporting biopic, starring Aaron Eckhart, Finn Wittrock and Robin Tunney.(n)

programme.title: Whisky Galore
programme.desc: Scottish islanders try to get their hands on the shipload of booze that washes up on their shores. Comedy, starring James Cosmo, Eddie Izzard and Naomi Battrick.(n)

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school students are drawn into the jungle setting of a video game. However, their digital alter egos are not what they expected. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall.(n)

programme.title: White Chicks
programme.desc: Two black male FBI agents pose as white female debutantes in the line of duty, donning full drag and very heavy make-up in an audacious bid to infiltrate a kidnapping ring. Comedy, starring brothers Shawn and Marlon Wayans, with Jaime King and Frankie Faison.(n)

programme.title: Norbit
programme.desc: A timid man's life is ruined after he is bullied into marrying an overbearing, overweight woman. However, a more hopeful future beckons when he bumps into his childhood sweetheart and realises she is his one true love - but first he has to pluck up the courage to confront his tyrannical wife. Comedy, starring Eddie Murphy in multiple roles alongside Thandie Newton, Cuba Gooding Jr and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: Victoria & Abdul
programme.desc: Queen Victoria strikes up an unlikely friendship with a young Indian clerk named Abdul Karim. Stephen Frears drama, starring Judi Dench, Ali Fazal and Tim Pigott-Smith.(n)

programme.title: Jumanji: Welcome to the Jungle
programme.desc: Four high school students are drawn into the jungle setting of a video game. However, their digital alter egos are not what they expected. Fantasy action comedy, starring Dwayne Johnson, Karen Gillan, Kevin Hart and Jack Black.(n)

programme.title: Girls Trip
programme.desc: When four lifelong friends travel to New Orleans for an annual festival, sisterhoods are rekindled and wild sides are rediscovered. Comedy, starring Regina Hall, Queen Latifah, Tiffany Haddish and Jada Pinkett Smith.(n)

programme.title: Underworld: Rise of the Lycans
programme.desc: Bold and charismatic werewolf slave Lucian incites his species to rebel against the vampires who enslaved them. Together with his secret lover - the daughter of vampire king Viktor - Lucian raises an army worthy of taking on their bloodsucking oppressors, beginning a centuries-long conflict. Fantasy horror prequel, starring Michael Sheen, Bill Nighy and Rhona Mitra.

programme.title: Retreat, Hell
programme.desc: US Marines have to battle their way through a frozen mountain pass despite dwindling supplies and continual enemy attacks. Korean War drama, made while the conflict was still raging, starring Frank Lovejoy, Anita Louise, Richard Carlson and Russ Tamblyn.

programme.title: The Devil at 4 O'Clock
programme.desc: A priest is sent to a South Seas island to replace a drunken missionary, who has been relieved of his duties. Sharing his flight are three convicts being sent to work at a children's leper hospital. The five men must work together to protect the young patients when a volcano erupts, leaving them stranded with no easy way out. Adventure, starring Spencer Tracy, Frank Sinatra and Kerwin Mathews.

programme.title: Warlock
programme.desc: A ruthless vigilante is recruited as a sheriff to clean up the streets of a crime-ridden town, but his strong-arm tactics soon antagonise the townsfolk. When a woman turns up and accuses the lawman of murdering her fiance, the residents rally to her cause with the help of a rival gunslinger. Western, starring Henry Fonda, Richard Widmark, Anthony Quinn, DeForest Kelley and Dorothy Malone.

programme.title: The Abyss
programme.desc: An American nuclear submarine is sunk after a collision with a mysterious object, and the US government asks oil workers to help with the rescue. However, when they and a Navy Seal team arrive at the location of the vessel, a series of strange incidents leads to an encounter with aliens living in the depths. James Cameron's sci-fi thriller, starring Ed Harris, Michael Biehn and Mary Elizabeth Mastrantonio.

programme.title: Joy Interview Special
programme.desc: Actress Jennifer Lawrence and director David O Russell about their third cinematic collaboration, a comedy drama about inventor Joy Mangano.

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Premiere. An imaginative youngster with dreams of being an inventor grows up to be a downtrodden single mother, struggling to support her chaotic family. She sees a chance to turn all their lives around when inspiration strikes and she creates a new household tool, but faces the challenge of selling her product in the demanding world of a home shopping TV station. Fact-based drama, starring Jennifer Lawrence, Robert De Niro and Bradley Cooper.

programme.title: Transporter 2
programme.desc: A retired former special forces agent has the job of chauffeuring the son of a controversial Miami politician. When Russian criminals kidnap the youngster and inject him with a virus in the hope of infecting his father, the driver sets out to find the boy and his abductors. Action thriller sequel, starring Jason Statham, Alessandro Gassman and Amber Valletta.

programme.title: Ninja III: The Domination
programme.desc: A nefarious ninja is killed by police, but his evil spirit survives to wreak more havoc in the body of an innocent aerobics instructor, who promptly sets about slaughtering his foes. Martial arts horror, starring Sho Kosugi, Lucinda Dickey and Jordan Bennett.

programme.title: Sahara
programme.desc: An American tank crew get lost in the desert during the retreat from El Alamein and face a desperate race against time to reach a source of water in an abandoned fortress - only to discover the Nazis are heading for the same location. Second World War melodrama which is all the more effective thanks to the straightforward nature of the plot and action. Humphrey Bogart, J Carrol Naish, Dan Duryea and Rex Ingram are among the excellent cast.

programme.title: The Black Knight
programme.desc: A humble sword-maker in the kingdom of King Arthur sets out to prove his worth as a knight in a bid to impress a nobleman's daughter. While fighting to foil an invasion, he discovers the attacking army is in league with traitors in the royal court. Swashbuckling adventure, starring Alan Ladd, Peter Cushing, Patricia Medina, Patrick Troughton and John Laurie.

programme.title: Hondo
programme.desc: A hard-boiled cavalry scout with a feral dog as companion stumbles across a woman and her child stranded on their homestead deep inside hostile territory. Despite repeated attacks by the Apaches, they refuse to leave their home, leaving the scout with no choice but to stay and defend her. Western, starring John Wayne, Geraldine Page, Ward Bond and Michael Pate.

programme.title: The Last Frontier
programme.desc: A backwoods trapper signs up as a cavalry scout at a fort manned by inexperienced soldiers, where he falls in love with a colonel's wife. On taking over command of the garrison, the officer plans to lead his men in a reckless attack on a hostile Indian tribe - and it is down to the frontiersman to save his comrades from a massacre. Western, starring Victor Mature, Robert Preston and Anne Bancroft.(c)

programme.title: The Wife Interview Special
programme.desc: Glenn Close talks about playing the complex title role in director Bjorn Runge's new drama.(c)

programme.title: Transcendence
programme.desc: A scientist working to develop artificial intelligence is assassinated, but his death provides the breakthrough he and his colleagues needed, as his own mind is uploaded into a computer system. Granted extraordinary knowledge, he begins planning to change the world for the better - with potentially horrific consequences for the human race. Sci-fi drama, starring Johnny Depp, Rebecca Hall and Morgan Freeman.

programme.title: The Green Mile
programme.desc: A convicted child-killer of towering height and massive build is condemned to death row, but astonishes the guards with his good nature and miraculous healing powers. They believe the gentle giant is incapable of crime, and emotions run high as they realise there is no hope of overturning his death sentence. Supernatural drama, based on a novel by Stephen King, starring Tom Hanks, Michael Clarke Duncan, David Morse and Harry Dean Stanton.

programme.title: Carnage Park
programme.desc: Two criminals take a woman hostage and flee into the backwoods following a disastrous bank robbery. What should have been a safe haven proves a far greater threat than the cops on their trail when they stray into the territory of a former military sniper driven by his experiences of war and who does not take kindly to strangers on his land. Horror, starring Ashley Bell and Pat Healy.(n)

programme.title: Red State
programme.desc: Three teenagers are lured to a remote area by an online offer of sex, only to fall into the clutches of a fanatical Christian sect. The preacher leading the group is on a mission to kill all those he judges as sinners, but his actions have been noticed by the local sheriff, and the church is soon under siege by federal agents. Thriller, starring Michael Parks and John Goodman.(n)

programme.title: The Boxtrolls
programme.desc: The people of a small town live in fear of underground trolls, who they do not realise are actually harmless. A boy raised by the creatures must convince the townsfolk there is nothing to fear when a team of pest exterminators is hired to wipe out the friendly monsters. Stop-motion animated fantasy, with the voices of Isaac Hempstead Wright, Elle Fanning and Ben Kingsley.(n)

programme.title: Spy Kids 4: All the Time in the World
programme.desc: A secret agent decides to retire after having a baby, while her two stepchildren remain completely unaware of her exciting past. They stumble on to the truth when she is recalled to duty and, with the aid of two former junior spies, they help battle an evil mastermind who has the power to control time. Family adventure, starring Jessica Alba, Jeremy Piven, Rowan Blanchard and Mason Cook.(n)

programme.title: Hotel for Dogs
programme.desc: An orphaned brother and sister face losing their beloved dog when they go into a foster home that does not allow pets. The kids find the ideal hiding place in an abandoned hotel, and set about transforming it into luxury canine accommodation for not just their beloved pet, but every stray in town. Family comedy, starring Emma Roberts, Jake T Austin, Don Cheadle and Lisa Kudrow.(n)

programme.title: First Daughter
programme.desc: The daughter of the US president is determined to lead a normal life and manages to persuade him to let her enrol at college as a normal student. However, she is unaware her father has hired a young special agent to go undercover at the same college - which creates a dilemma when she falls in love with him. Romantic comedy, starring Katie Holmes, Marc Blucas, Michael Keaton and Amerie.(n)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: A bumbling New York cop is unable to pursue a gang of bank robbers in their souped-up getaway car because he does not have a driving licence. Fortunately, help is on hand in the form of a taxi driver with dreams of becoming a racing driver, and whose customised cab is the fastest in New York. Comedy adventure remake, starring Queen Latifah, Jimmy Fallon and Gisele Bundchen.(n)

programme.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
programme.desc: A New York stockbroker rises from unemployment to become one of the richest men in the city's financial elite through an illegal scheme to defraud investors. His wealth brings him an outrageously debauched lifestyle, but comes at a price as the FBI become suspicious of his manipulation of the markets. Martin Scorsese's fact-based drama, starring Leonardo DiCaprio, Jonah Hill and Matthew McConaughey.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Tree
programme.desc: Heart-warming festive drama, starring Andrew McCarthy as a gardener who strikes up an unlikely friendship with a nun while wrangling over the fate of an endangered fir tree, and learns the true meaning of Christmas. Trini Alvarado also stars in Sally Field's directorial debut.

programme.title: Ms Scrooge
programme.desc: A mean-spirited banker is persuaded to change her ways when she is visited by a series of ghosts on Christmas eve. Festive fantasy inspired by Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, with Cicely Tyson and Katherine Helmond.

programme.title: Stealing Christmas
programme.desc: A fugitive lies low in a small town, where he starts to plan his next job on the local bank. However, as he gets involved in the everyday life of the community - even playing Santa for the children - he is dogged by doubts and second thoughts as he reflects on how warmly the residents have welcomed him. Crime comedy, starring Tony Danza, Lea Thompson and Betty White.

programme.title: An Accidental Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple are tricked into spending Christmas together by their scheming children, and begin to remember what they saw in one another. Romantic drama, starring Cynthia Gibb and David Milbern.

programme.title: A Boyfriend for Christmas
programme.desc: A 13-year-old girl wishes Santa would bring her a boyfriend for Christmas. Twenty years later, she is a lawyer recovering from a break-up and dreading Christmas with her parents. She receives an unexpected visit from a handsome stranger, who appears to be the answer to her teenage wish. Romantic drama, starring Kelli Williams, Shane Baumel, Charles Durning and Patrick Muldoon.

programme.title: A Christmas Song
programme.desc: Two schools are merged, and rivalries develop between students and staff. The music teachers from the two schools realise that only one of them will be kept on as they coach their choirs for a televised singing contest - but their professional and artistic conflicts are complicated by their growing feelings for each other. Romantic drama, with Natasha Henstridge and Gabe Hogan.

programme.title: The Christmas Clause
programme.desc: A stressed-out lawyer struggles to balance her work with taking care of her children. She idly wonders what life would be like if she had focused solely on her career rather than starting a family - but when her wish is granted, her simple life is not what she expected it to be. Festive family fantasy, with Lea Thompson and Andrew Airlee.

programme.title: Christmas in the Clouds
programme.desc: The Native American manager of a ski resort desperately tries to impress a woman he thinks is a writer for a travel guide, while she in turn mistakes him for her mysterious internet boyfriend. Meanwhile, the real hotel critic is left in the hands of the lodge's eccentric staff. Comedy, starring Timothy Vahle, Mariana Tosca, Graham Greene and M Emmet Walsh.

programme.title: An Accidental Christmas
programme.desc: A separated couple are tricked into spending Christmas together by their scheming children, and begin to remember what they saw in one another. Romantic drama, starring Cynthia Gibb and David Milbern.

programme.title: Prancer Returns
programme.desc: A youngster moves to a new area, but has trouble settling in, especially when the local bullies set their sights on him. However, his luck seems to take a turn for the better when he discovers a sweet little reindeer in the snow and vows to take care of it - only to have a battle on his hands when locals find out about the cute creature. Festive fantasy adventure, starring Gavin Fink, Stacy Edwards, John Corbett and Jack Palance.

programme.title: Christmas in Connecticut
programme.desc: The presenter of a TV show about cookery, marriage and home-making is secretly a childless widow who lives alone and does not know one end of a saucepan from the other. Unfortunately, her ratings-hungry producer decides to film in her home on Christmas Day, and sets about finding her a fictional family to fool the viewers. Comedy directed by Arnold Schwarzenegger, starring Dyan Cannon, Kris Kristofferson and Tony Curtis.

programme.title: Merry In-Laws
programme.desc: A woman meets her fiance's parents for the first time just before Christmas, and is amazed to discover they are Santa Claus and his wife. While the experience restore her childhood love of Christmas, her cynical father is determined to stop her going through with the wedding. Comedy, with George Wendt, Shelley Long ad Kassia Warshawski.

programme.title: Battle of the Bulbs
programme.desc: Bob Wallace prides himself on always having the most spectacular Christmas lights in his town, but this year, he discovers his new neighbour has an equally festive display. This leads to a bitter rivalry as they go to ridiculous lengths to outshine each other. Comedy, with Daniel Stern and Matt Frewer.

programme.title: The Christmas Dragon
programme.desc: An orphan meets a dying elf, who entrusts her with a mystical orb and tells her that she must use it to restore Fatehr Christmas' fading magical powers. Aided by her fellow orphans and Father Christmas' wayward son, she sets off on a perilous journey to return the crystal to its home in the North Pole, facing all manner of monsters on the way. Fantasy adventure, starring Bailee Michelle Johnson and Jake Stormoen.

programme.title: Twice Upon a Christmas

programme.title: 3 Day Christmas
programme.desc: A distraught father realises he and his family have forgotten how to communicate, so comes up with a drastic solution. Comedy, starring George Newbern, Megyn Price and Corbin Bernsen, who also directed.

Disney fantasy comedy, starring Ed Asner, Fred Gwynne, Rene Auberjonois and Susan Tyrrell.

programme.title: The Year Without a Santa Claus
programme.desc: Father Christmas becomes so frustrated with the commercialisation of the festive season that he decides to quit - so two elves and a reindeer embark on a quest to find a child who still believes in the spirit of Christmas to persuade him to change his mind. Fantasy, starring John Goodman, Delta Burke and Michael McKean.(n)

programme.title: The Three Gifts
programme.desc: Three mischievous orphans spend the Christmas season with a childless couple while the home they live in is renovated. They learn their hosts are considering adopting a single youngster, causing rivalry to erupt between the kids - but the husband is not sure he is ready for fatherhood. Festive drama, starring Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Instant Message
programme.desc: Two pen pals who have written to each other since childhood finally get the chance to meet face to face. The only problem is that when they exchanged pictures, both sent a photo of their best friend instead. Confusion ensues as both correspondents try to coerce their friends into posing as them. Romantic comedy, starring Marla Sokoloff, Patrick J Adams and Lindy Booth.(n)

Disney fantasy comedy, starring Ed Asner, Fred Gwynne, Rene Auberjonois and Susan Tyrrell.(n)

programme.title: Mr St Nick
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides it is time to hang up his hat and hand the reins of the family business over to his son - who is less than enthusiastic about donning the famed red suit, preferring to spend his time on Miami Beach, throwing the future of the festive season into doubt. Festive comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Charles Durning and Elaine Hendrix.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack.(n)

programme.desc: A separated couple are tricked into spending Christmas together by their scheming children, and begin to remember what they saw in one another. Romantic drama, starring Cynthia Gibb and David Milbern.(n)

programme.title: The Three Gifts
programme.desc: Three mischievous orphans spend the Christmas season with a childless couple while the home they live in is renovated. They learn their hosts are considering adopting a single youngster, causing rivalry to erupt between the kids - but the husband is not sure he is ready for fatherhood. Festive drama, starring Dean Cain and Jean Louisa Kelly.(n)

programme.title: Instant Message
programme.desc: Two pen pals who have written to each other since childhood finally get the chance to meet face to face. The only problem is that when they exchanged pictures, both sent a photo of their best friend instead. Confusion ensues as both correspondents try to coerce their friends into posing as them. Romantic comedy, starring Marla Sokoloff, Patrick J Adams and Lindy Booth.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Star
programme.desc: A con man dresses up as Santa Claus to break out of jail and recover his hidden stash of stolen loot. However, his perfect little plan is thrown into chaos after he's mistaken for the genuine article by two inquisitive kids - who end up making life very difficult indeed. Disney fantasy comedy, starring Ed Asner, Fred Gwynne, Rene Auberjonois and Susan Tyrrell.(n)

programme.title: Mr St Nick
programme.desc: Father Christmas decides it is time to hang up his hat and hand the reins of the family business over to his son - who is less than enthusiastic about donning the famed red suit, preferring to spend his time on Miami Beach, throwing the future of the festive season into doubt. Festive comedy, starring Kelsey Grammer, Charles Durning and Elaine Hendrix.(n)

programme.title: A Christmas Wedding Date
programme.desc: A woman returns to her home town after 10 years away to attend a wedding, and ends up magically reliving the day over and over again. The experience gives her a chance to see a different side to the people she has rejected to further her career, and she rebuilds bridges with her mother and her high-school boyfriend. Comedy, with Marla Sokoloff and Chris Carmack.(n)

programme.title: Ms Scrooge
programme.desc: A mean-spirited banker is persuaded to change her ways when she is visited by a series of ghosts on Christmas eve. Festive fantasy inspired by Charles Dickens' A Christmas Carol, with Cicely Tyson and Katherine Helmond.(n)

programme.title: The Christmas Clause
programme.desc: A stressed-out lawyer struggles to balance her work with taking care of her children. She idly wonders what life would be like if she had focused solely on her career rather than starting a family - but when her wish is granted, her simple life is not what she expected it to be. Festive family fantasy, with Lea Thompson and Andrew Airlee.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.(n)

Festive family fantasy, with Lea Thompson and Andrew Airlee.(n)

programme.title: A Miracle on Christmas Lake
programme.desc: After losing his friend on Christmas Eve, a 16-year-old ventures out onto the lake where they played countless games of winter hockey, only to find a magic rink that only appears at night. So when a local construction company purchases the land for development, he rallies the townsfolk to help him play one last game. Fantasy drama, starring Kristian Jackson and Siobhan Williams.(n)

programme.title: Sony Movie News
programme.desc: The latest cinema news, celebrity gossip and Hollywood rumours.(n)

So when a local construction company purchases the land for development, he rallies the townsfolk to help him play one last game. Fantasy drama, starring Kristian Jackson and Siobhan Williams.(n)

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: When the Coast Guard discovers a drug-smuggling yacht carrying victims of the Colombian drug cartel, the U.S. President launches a secret operation against the cartel on Colombian soil, which ultimately results in disaster...and a cover-up. Jack Ryan (Harrison Ford) must rescue the American team left behind in Colombia. Based on the Tom Clancy suspense novel.

programme.title: The Rock
programme.desc: All of San Francisco is taken hostage when a vengeful general (Ed Harris) seizes control of Alcatraz Island, threatening to launch missiles loaded with deadly poison gas. With time running out, only a young FBI chemical weapons expert (Nicolas Cage) and a notorious federal prisoner (Sean Connery) have the skills to penetrate the island fortress and defuse the situation.

programme.title: 2018 Week 4
programme.desc: Every team, every game, every week of the football season. Join host James Brown for exclusive game highlights from NFL Films plus, expert analysis, in-depth features and hard-hitting commentary from NFL MVPs Phil Simms and Boomer Esiason, veteran linebacker Ray Lewis and special correspondent Steve Smith, Sr.(c)

programme.title: Baby Driver
programme.desc: A talented young getaway driver (Ansel Elgort) relies on the beat of his personal soundtrack to be the best in the game. When he meets the girl of his dreams (Lily James), Baby sees a chance to ditch his criminal life and make a clean getaway. But after being coerced into working for a crime boss (Kevin Spacey), he must face the music when a doomed heist threatens his life, love and freedom.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: Just Another Immigrant: Romesh at the Greek
programme.desc: Romesh Ranganathan, a successful comedian in England, moves his entire family to Los Angeles to pursue his lifelong dream of making it as a stand-up comedian in America. He then takes the drastic, and possibly foolish, step of performing his first ever U.S. stand-up show at the six-thousand seat historic Greek Theater.

programme.title: Extraordinary Measures
programme.desc: A devoted father (Brendan Fraser) abandons his successful career to partner with an outcast doctor (Harrison Ford) in finding a cure for the rare disease that is a death sentence for his children. Keri Russell costars in this drama based on a true story.

programme.title: Patch Adams
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Hunter "Patch" Adams who, after staying in a mental hospital, decides to enlist in med school to become a doctor. Determined to help patients with a unique blend of personal attention and humor, he turns the medical world upside-down with his unorthodox-but-effective treatments.

programme.title: The Edge of Seventeen
programme.desc: Nadine (Hailee Steinfeld) and Krista (Haley Lu Richardson) are inseparable best friends attempting to navigate high school together, until Nadine's older brother Darian (Blake Jenner) and Krista begin dating. With her view of the world rocked, Nadine is forced to see the people in her life, including her well-meaning but distracted mother (Kyra Sedgwick), and unlikely mentor and History teacher Mr. Bruner (Woody Harrelson), with fresh eyes and new appreciation. She realizes that people - and life - are more complicated than she thought.

programme.title: 10 Things I Hate About You
programme.desc: New high school student Cameron (Gordon-Levitt) is smitten with Bianca (Oleynik), but in order to get around her father's strict rules on dating, he must get bad boy Patrick (Ledger) to date Bianca's ill-tempered sister, Kat (Stiles).

programme.title: Anger Management
programme.desc: Dave Buznik (Adam Sandler) is usually a mild-mannered kind of guy. But after an altercation on an airplane, he is remanded to the care of a therapist (Jack Nicholson) who could probably use some anger management himself.

programme.title: The Thomas Crown Affair
programme.desc: Stylish remake of the 1968 crime caper about a millionaire playboy thief, Thomas Crown (Pierce Brosnan), who steals priceless works of art for the sheer, adrenaline-fueled fun of it, and the sexy insurance investigator (Rene Russo) who's both attracted to her suspect and determined to nab him. Denis Leary costars in this classy, witty thriller.

programme.title: Judgment Day
programme.desc: The focus remains tightly on the confirmation of Brett Kavanaugh to the Supreme Court, the future of U.S. Deputy Attorney General Rod Rosenstein notwithstanding. As legions of outspoken critics and fans of Judge Kavanaugh vie for attention on Capitol Hill, and allegations of sexual misconduct continue to surface, the temperature in the capital climbs steadily upward. For much of the week John Heilemann is embedded with attorney Michael Avenatti, who may just have the most explosive revelations of all.(c)

programme.title: Do Right, Vote White!
programme.desc: Election day puts Frank and Fiona in a head to head battle as they each try to round up votes for their candidates. Lip has to make an important choice about Xan’s future. Debbie gets in over her head with Alex. Carl’s killer instinct is put to the test. With his trial looming, Ian struggles to decide how to plead. 100th episode!(c)

programme.title: Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind
programme.desc: A couple meet on a Long Island commuter train, are drawn to each other's opposing personalities, and begin a tenuous relationship. Then they discover that they were already lovers for two years in the past, and chose to have their painful relationship erased from their minds by the cutting-edge technology of a company called Lacuna Inc., where the employees are hiding their own secrets from each other and themselves. Jim Carrey, Kate Winslet and Kirsten Dunst star in this acclaimed comedy drama that won an Oscar(R) for Best Original Screenplay.

programme.title: Eddie Griffin: Undeniable
programme.desc: This comedy special is Griffin's magnum opus about the world, relationships and humanity as a whole. He celebrates his 30-year anniversary in comedy by being on stage and pulling laughter from his fans during the live taping.

programme.title: Breakdown
programme.desc: Jeff Taylor (Kurt Russell) and his wife Amy (Kathleen Quinlan) are headed toward a new life in California when their car's engine dies on a remote highway. Amy accepts a ride from a helpful trucker (J.T. Walsh) while Jeff waits with the car. But when Jeff shows up at the agreed rendezvous, he finds his wife's not there. The locals aren't talking; the police aren't much help. With no one to turn to, Jeff battles his worst fears and begins a desperate, danger-ridden search to find Amy before it's too late.

programme.title: The Queen
programme.desc: In the wake of Princess Diana's death, the very private and tradition-bound Queen Elizabeth II finds herself in conflict with the new Prime Minister, the slickly modern and image-conscious Tony Blair.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: Meet the Parents
programme.desc: Greg Focker (Ben Stiller) is head over heels in love with his girlfriend Pam (Teri Polo) and is ready to pop the big question. When his attempt to propose is thwarted by a phone call with the news that Pam's younger sister is getting married, Greg realizes that the key to Pam's hand in marriage lies with her formidable father, Jack Byrnes (Robert DeNiro). A trip to New York for her sister's wedding seems just the right occasion for Greg to ask Pam to be his wife. But everything that could possibly go wrong, does.

programme.title: Meet the Fockers
programme.desc: Ben Stiller is back as Gaylord "Greg" Focker, the unlucky fiancé who must endure another humiliating parental exchange. Having given him their daughter's hand, Jack and Dina Byrnes (Oscar® winner Robert De Niro and Blythe Danner) now travel to Florida to meet Greg's parents - a couple who couldn't be more different from the ex-CIA agent and his wife. Oscar® winners Dustin Hoffman and Barbra Streisand co-star as the eccentric Fockers.

programme.title: Jerry Maguire
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is a successful sports agent who must start over and rebuild his life from the ground up. Also starring Cuba Gooding, Jr., Renee Zellweger and Kelly Preston.

programme.title: Rescue Dawn
programme.desc: A U.S. fighter pilot's epic struggle of survival after being shot down on a mission over Laos during the Vietnam War.

programme.title: Anthropoid
programme.desc: Based on the true story of Operation Anthropoid, the WW II mission to assassinate SS General Reinhard Heydrich, the main architect behind the Final Solution and the Reich's third in command after Hitler and Himmler.

programme.title: Inglourious Basterds
programme.desc: A squadron of vengeful, Nazi-killing Allied soldiers becomes embroiled in a plot to firebomb a Parisian movie theater hosting a film premiere that Adolf Hitler plans to attend in this comically violent World War II action smash starring Brad Pitt, Diane Kruger and Oscar® winner Christoph Waltz.(n)

It seems the only real hardship this loving couple faces is difficulty conceiving a child, but when Gina is given the opportunity to have a corneal transplant and regains her vision, their life and relationship are upended.(n)

Alice agrees to let the guys stay in her guest house temporarily, but the arrangement ends up unfolding in unexpected ways.(n)

programme.title: Quantum of Solace
programme.desc: Daniel Craig returns as British secret agent James Bond in this sequel that finds the dapper, lethal spy pursuing the villains behind the death of his murdered lover and uncovering a sinister global organization bent on world domination. Olga Kurylenko and Mathieu Amalric costar in this dazzling follow-up.(n)

programme.title: 4/20 Massacre
programme.desc: During a weed-fueled weekend, five young women decide to celebrate a friend's birthday by taking a camping trip to a nearby national park. However, their fun is quickly snubbed out when they stumble upon an illegal marijuana operation hidden in the greenery and protected by a bloodthirsty maniac. Will they survive or will they perish in search of the ultimate high?

programme.title: Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Next Generation
programme.desc: A terrifying new version of the original horror hit from one of the first film's writers, this updated horror hit stars Matthew McConaughey and Renee Zellweger in the story of ill-fated teenagers whose prom night auto breakdown lands them squarely in the clutches of a demented rural family of serial killers.

programme.title: Prom Night
programme.desc: Donna's senior prom is supposed to be the best night of her life. After surviving a horrible tragedy, she has finally moved on and is enjoying her last year of high school. Surrounded by her best friends, she should be safe from the horrors of her past. But when the night turns deadly, there is only one person who could be responsible - a man she thought was gone forever. Now, Donna and her friends must find a way to escape the sadistic rampage of an obsessed killer, and survive a night "to die for.".

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?

programme.title: Survival Island
programme.desc: A shipwreck at sea leaves a wealthy married couple (Billy Zane and Kelly Brook) alive with only each other and a former servant (Juan Pablo di Pace) for companionship - a situation that quickly leads to sexual jealousy and murderous intentions.

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.

programme.title: Cold Souls
programme.desc: Paul Giamatti stars in this surreal comedy as an actor paralyzed by anxiety who decides to have his soul extracted by a high-tech company in order to alleviate his suffering but complications ensue when a mysterious soul-trafficking mule steals his soul and takes it to Russia.

programme.title: Dudes & Dragons
programme.desc: When a powerful wizard is jilted by a princess, he vows to rid the land of love and commands a fire breathing dragon to destroy any sign of affection seen throughout the kingdom but as the death toll rises, a brave and arrogant warrior and his estranged brother answer the princess’ call to fight the curse.

programme.title: King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table
programme.desc: Facing defeat, Merlin banishes the evil enchantress Morgana and her son to the ends of universe. Vowing revenge, Morgana and her son return to Earth, hell-bent on destroying every last descendant of King Arthur and his Knights.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: Down
programme.desc: When the express elevators in New York City's 102-story Millennium Building start to malfunction, elevator mechanics Mark (James Marshall) and Jeff (Eric Thal) are sent to find the cause. After a series of gruesome and deadly accidents occur, Mark joins forces with a reporter named Jennifer (Naomi Watts). As the death toll rises and the building is sealed off amid claims of terrorism, Mark and Jennifer attempt to unravel the secret behind the mysterious behavior of the elevator.

programme.title: The Harvest
programme.desc: A couple who keeps their sick son in a secluded environment find their controlled lives challenged by a young girl who moves in next door. The perfect family is not who they appear to be. Starring Michael Shannon.

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth.

programme.title: Ratpocalypse
programme.desc: American Senator John Perryman (Casper Van Dien) delivers a fiery speech in Moscow about the country's main evil - corruption. A corruption so pervasive it will turn men into rats. He declares that he was ordered to speak to them from above and threatens everyone with the loss of their human form, which draws only guffaws and resentment from the people. Many take the Senator for a madman. Eventually the Senator meets a mysterious girl in the streets, and everything he talked about in Moscow begins to come true, triggering panic.

programme.title: Bridge to Terabithia
programme.desc: Jess and Leslie couldn't be more different—she's rich, he's poor, she's from the city, he's from the country—but when Leslie begins to open up the world of imagination to Jess, they find they have something amazing to share: the kingdom of Terabithia, a realm of giants, ogres and other enchanted beings that can only be accessed by boldly swinging across a stream in the woods on a strand of rope. Here, Leslie and Jess rule as King and Queen among the incredible creatures they create, and not even the forces of evil can break their bond.

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.

programme.title: B&B
programme.desc: Marc and Fred go to war when they are refused a double bed at a Christian B&B. They win their court case and go back. Triumph turns to terror when a Russian neo-Nazi checks in. Their weekend of fun becomes a bloody battle.(c)

programme.title: The Space Between Us
programme.desc: Shortly after arriving to help colonize Mars, an astronaut dies while giving birth to the first human born on the red planet, unable to reveal who the father is. The child, Gardner Elliot, is an inquisitive, highly intelligent boy who reaches the age of 16 having only met 14 people in his life. While searching for clues about his father, and the home planet he's never known, Gardner begins an online friendship with a street-smart girl named Tulsa. He arrives on Earth, eager to experience all of the wonders he's only read about.(c)

programme.title: ATM
programme.desc: After leaving a party together, coworkers David (Brian Geraghty), Emily (Alice Eve) and Corey (Josh Peck) stop at an ATM. Pulling into a desolate parking lot, Corey gets out to get cash and a routine transaction turns into a struggle for survival when an unknown man appears outside blocking their exit. With the wintry temperatures dipping below freezing, and the morning sunrise still hours away, they have no choice but to play the man's deadly game of cat-and-mouse.(c)

programme.title: Primal Rage
programme.desc: Lost deep in the forest of the Pacific Northwest, Ashley and Max Carr are stalked by a terrifying creature that might be Bigfoot. Embroiled in a strange land of Native American myth and legend turned real, they must fight back against the monster in a desperate battle of life or death.(c)

programme.title: The Funhouse Massacre
programme.desc: On Halloween night, a group of notorious serial killers escape from an asylum and terrorize the patrons of a funhouse carnival - leaving only a rag-tag bunch of kids, a clueless deputy and a local sheriff to stop the carnage.(n)

programme.title: Shark Babes
programme.desc: A group of sexy marine biologists discover how sharks emit an erotic sound that no woman can resist. But will their research take them to new heights or simply turn them into shark babes bent on overthrowing mankind with sensuality?(n)

programme.title: Attack of the Lederhosen Zombies
programme.desc: When a scientific experiment unleashes an epidemic of zombies in the Alps, a trio of snowboarders find themselves in a battle for survival where they must use their snowboarding skills to defeat the aprés-ski undead once and for all.(n)

programme.title: Skybound
programme.desc: Five plane passengers are unable to land after a gigantic disaster happens on the ground.(n)

programme.title: Bigfoot and the Burtons
programme.desc: When an ignored little boy bonds with Bigfoot and discovers the human-like ape is in danger, he finds the courage to stand up to those bigger than him to save the creature and set his new friend free.(n)

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Visionary writer/director Kerry Conran created this arresting adventure yarn modeled on the sci-fi cliffhangers of the '30s and '40s, where giant flying robots menace Manhattan and humanity's only hope is square-jawed hero Sky Captain (Jude Law) and a sassy girl reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) with whom he has a checkered past. Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi, Michael Gambon and Bai Ling co-star in this exciting, pulse-pounding spectacle.(n)

programme.title: The Haunting
programme.desc: In the 1860's, Hugh Crain finances the construction of Hill House, then dies an unexplained death. Tales circulate that the mansion is haunted by evil spirits. 130 years later, Dr. David Marrow (Liam Neeson), long fascinated by the Hill House legend, brings three people there for what he tells them will be a study in sleep disorders. They're outwardly brave, but it soon becomes evident that Hill House's sinister reputation has all of them on edge. Catherine Zeta-Jones, Lili Taylor and Owen Wilson costar.(n)

programme.title: The Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy
programme.desc: Seconds before Earth is destroyed to make way for a new hyperspace express route, mild-mannered Arthur Dent is whisked into space by his best friend (an alien posing as an out-of-work actor). And so the misadventures begin as he and fellow travelers, including the cool but dim-witted President of the Galaxy, the Earth girl Trillian, and Marvin the paranoid android, search for answers to the mystery of Life, the Universe and Everything.(n)

programme.title: The Stepford Wives
programme.desc: Nicole Kidman, Matthew Broderick and Christopher Walken star in this satirical remake of the classic thriller about a planned community where the picture-perfect women are a little too eerily flawless. Glenn Close, Bette Midler, Jon Lovitz and Roger Bart costar in this wickedly acerbic comedy from writer Paul Rudnick ("Addams Family Values," "In & Out").(n)

programme.title: Urban Legend
programme.desc: A psychotic killer takes recreates the mythical "urban legends" that circulate through America's schools with flawless accuracy on a besieged college campus in this teen slasher flick. The all-star cast of this box office hit includes Alicia Witt, Tara Reid, Rebecca Gayheart, Jared Leto, Joshua Jackson, Loretta Devine, Robert Englund, John Neville, Natasha Wagner and Brad Dourif.(n)

programme.title: Lady Psycho Killer
programme.desc: A knife-wielding killer is on the loose in a small town slicing and dicing men of questionable intent. As her brutality leaves the town littered with corpses, her bloodlust is lost on her young lover who pursues her anyway.(n)

programme.title: Sky Captain and the World of Tomorrow
programme.desc: Visionary writer/director Kerry Conran created this arresting adventure yarn modeled on the sci-fi cliffhangers of the '30s and '40s, where giant flying robots menace Manhattan and humanity's only hope is square-jawed hero Sky Captain (Jude Law) and a sassy girl reporter (Gwyneth Paltrow) with whom he has a checkered past. Angelina Jolie, Giovanni Ribisi, Michael Gambon and Bai Ling co-star in this exciting, pulse-pounding spectacle.(n)

programme.title: Personal Shopper
programme.desc: By day, American in Paris Maureen (Kristen Stewart) works as a personal shopper, motor-biking around the city buying up deluxe couture for a celebrity client. By night, she attempts to channel the spirits of the dead, hoping to make contact with her recently deceased twin brother. When Maureen begins receiving a series of chilling, increasingly sinister text messages, it seems she may have made contact - but she doesn't know with whom.

programme.title: Everything's So F**king Obvious, I'm Starting to Wonder Why We're Even Having This Co
programme.desc: Concerned about repercussions from Denna, Marty looks to secure his place at K&A. Jeannie receives an exciting proposition. Clyde reaches out to his father, and Roscoe is at the center of an ugly incident at school.

programme.title: You're Safely Sucking at the Triple-Venti Tits of The New Kaan & Associates
programme.desc: Marty is on the verge of making K&A one of the biggest players in the business, if he can persuade his employees to stay. Jeannie gives birth. Clyde, Doug, and Kelsey await an offer - and Roscoe faces the consequences. Season finale.

programme.title: Memento
programme.desc: Leonard (Guy Pearce) is tracking down the man who raped and murdered his wife. The difficulty, however, of locating his wife's killer is compounded by the fact that he suffers from a rare, untreatable form of memory loss. Although he can recall details of life before his accident, Leonard cannot remember what happened fifteen minutes ago, where he's going, or why.

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes.

programme.title: Bipolar Rock 'N' Roller
programme.desc: A raw and unflinching account of Mauro Ranallo's decades-long struggle with Bipolar Affective Disorder. The voice of WWE and Showtime Championship Boxing, Ranallo has called some of the biggest sports events in history - all the while fighting his own epic battles with mental health. Follow his journey as he combats the stigma behind mental health issues and sheds light on what it's like being at the top of the industry despite seemingly insurmountable odds.

programme.title: Nocturne
programme.desc: Isaac intends to throw the greatest graduation party of all time while his parents are out of town. Instead, he is disappointed to find that only a handful of his friends show up. Intent on making the best of the night, the group performs a séance to learn more about the futures that lie before them. The seemingly innocent game goes terribly wrong and they soon find that they are not alone in the house. Something has joined the party, and it wants them dead.

programme.title: Punching Henry
programme.desc: A journeyman comedian (Henry Phillips) is lured to L.A. by a TV producer (J.K. Simmons) who wants to make him a reality star. As reality sets in, he must decide whether his legacy will be to tell jokes for a living or become the butt of them, in this glimpse behind the weird world of comedy. Sarah Silverman, Tig Notaro, Jim Jefferies and Doug Stanhope also star.

programme.title: George Michael: Freedom
programme.desc: Documentary covering the span of his career, but concentrating on the formative period in the late Grammy Award winner's life, leading up to and following the making of his acclaimed album 'Listen Without Prejudice Vol. 1' and the subsequent High Court battle with his record label that followed, while also becoming poignantly personal about the death of his late partner and first love, Anselmo Feleppa. Filmed before Michael's untimely passing, the film is narrated by him, who was heavily involved in the making of it.

programme.title: When Bowie Met Bolan
programme.desc: Teenagers David and Marc are yet to hit the big time but an afternoon painting their manager's office is the start of a lifelong friendship between the two, who will eventually be known as music legends David Bowie and Marc Bolan.

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later.

programme.title: JIMI: All Is By My Side
programme.desc: André Benjamin stars as Jimi Hendrix in this revealing biopic from writer-director John Ridley ('12 Years A Slave'). Covering a transformative year in Hendrix's life from 1966-67, in which he went from a New York City backing musician to making his mark in London's music scene up until his Monterey Pop triumph, the film presents an intimate portrait of the sensitive young musician on the verge of becoming a rock legend.

programme.title: Deuces Wild
programme.desc: From the director of "The Basketball Diaries" comes this blazing drama about New York street gang warfare circa 1958. After their brother died of a drug overdose, Deuces gang members Leon (Stephen Dorff) and Bobby (Brad Renfro) vowed to keep narcotics off their Brooklyn turf - but during a sweltering summer of violence and conflict with a rival outfit called the Vipers theirs is an increasingly tough promise to keep. Matt Dillon, Fairuza Balk, Drea De Matteo, Vincent Pastore, Frankie Muniz and James Franco costar in this pulpy period picture.

programme.title: A Rising Tide
programme.desc: After the destruction of his family's restaurant during Hurricane Sandy, a young chef (Hunter Parrish) must grow up quickly, taking the biggest risks of his life both in business and love. Life starts to go his way when he meets a wealthy patron (Tim Daly) and has a chance encounter with Sarah (Ashley Hinshaw). As a chain of unexpected events unfolds for all of them, as they discover the only way to achieve their dreams may be to acknowledge what they owe to others - and let destiny take its course.

programme.title: Bad Grandmas
programme.desc: Senior citizens Mimi, Bobbi, Virginia and Coralee quietly live out their twilight years in Southern Missouri playing cards and baking cakes. Bobbi's son-in-law, Jim, cons her into losing her house and Mimi, the unofficial leader of the group, decides to take matters into her own hands. Things spin out of control when she confronts Jim and he accidentally gets killed in the altercation.

programme.title: Cell
programme.desc: At the Boston airport, Clay (John Cusack) witnesses a scene of chaotic mayhem when an electronic signal turns hundreds of cell phone users into rabid killers. Desperate to find his estranged wife and son, Clay teams with a train driver (Samuel L. Jackson) to battle the horde of murderous phoners as the city descends into madness.

programme.title: King Arthur
programme.desc: An adventure that tells the true story of Arthur (Clive Owen) and his bond of brotherhood with Lancelot (Ioan Gruffudd) and the Knights Of The Round Table as they fight for freedom and those they love. Co-starring Keira Knightley.

programme.title: Man On A Ledge
programme.desc: When former NYPD officer turned prison escapee Nick Cassidy (Sam Worthington) enters the famed Roosevelt Hotel on 45th and Madison in New York City, heads to one of the highest floors and steps out a window onto the ledge, he threatens more than just his own well-being. A whole city is about to seize up, including some very nervous people with some very big secrets. Elizabeth Banks, Ed Harris and Edward Burns co-star in this propulsive, twisty action thriller.

programme.title: Creative Destruction Phenomenon
programme.desc: Marty's back on top - and life is good. Jeannie and Marty navigate the hazards of co-parenting, along with each other's new relationships, while Doug and Clyde maneuver for position. A familiar face from the past approaches Marty with an intriguing offer. Season premiere.(c)

programme.title: Game Theory
programme.desc: Jeannie's boyfriend drops a bomb that could devastate her. Marty goes after potential new business at Doug's "Dungeons & Dragons" game. Clyde uncovers an issue that affects Jeannie.(c)

programme.title: The Loft
programme.desc: Five married men share the only key to a sleek penthouse apartment they use for secret rendezvous with lovers and one-night stands. When Vincent (Karl Urban) unlocks the door one morning to discover a beautiful blonde, naked and dead in the bed, he calls his best friends Chris (James Marsden), Marty (Eric Stonestreet), Luke (Wentworth Miller) and Filip (Matthias Shoenhaerts) to piece together what happened and get their stories straight. But as police close in on their prime suspect, friendships and marriages start to unravel.

programme.title: Lawless Range
programme.desc: Brothers Sean and Tommy Donnelly live and work in modern day Texas. Tommy has always been troubled and Sean has always been there to help him but when Tommy gets himself into debt there's not much Sean can do. The money is owed to some very dangerous people and neither Sean nor Tommy has a spare dime. At every turn, Tommy manages to find a way to exacerbate their already difficult position. The situation escalates to the point where Sean is faced with a decision: stand by his brother or give up on him once and for all.

programme.title: Jackson
programme.desc: An intimate documentary look into the lives of three women caught up in the complex issues surrounding access to reproductive healthcare in the Deep South: Shannon Brewer, director of Jackson Women's Health Organization, the only remaining abortion clinic in Mississippi; Barbara Beaver, a leader of the anti-abortion movement, who runs the Center for Pregnancy Choices; and April Jackson, a young mother of four faced with another unplanned pregnancy.

programme.title: 7 Guardians of the Tomb
programme.desc: A team of scientists made up of Jia (Li Bingbing), Ridley (Kellan Lutz), and Mason (Kelsey Grammer) are in search for a lost colleague in an ancient labyrinth. Before it's too late, the group must battle their way through a swarm of deadly, man-eating funnel web spiders and find out what is behind the arachnids' power and intelligence used to protect a secret powerful elixir.

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
